department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Department of National Defence needs oscilloscopes
full_summary:
##title.title-eng: Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, SA E60PV-19EQUI, Oscilloscopes
##title.title-fra: Équipement et instrument de laboratoire, AMA E60PV-19EQU, oscilloscopes

**Tender Information**
=====================

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-930-58658564
* **Tender Solicitation Number**: W2037-24-054A/B
* **Publication Date**: November 1, 2023 (2023-11-01)
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 16, 2023, 1:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled
* **UNSPSC Code**: 41100000 (Laboratory and Scientific Equipment), 41113638 (Oscilloscopes)

**Notice**
----------

This judicial notice is a restricted invitation only. The Department of National Defence invites prequalified suppliers to participate in the bidding process for the procurement of laboratory and scientific equipment, including oscilloscopes.

**Pre-qualified Suppliers**
-------------------------

Only the following pre-qualified suppliers are eligible to participate in this tender:

* Fisher Scientific
* VWR International Ltd.
* Alpha Controls & Instrumentation Inc.
* Safe Leaf Extract Solutions Inc.

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

The selection criteria for this tender are based on the lowest compliant cost.

**Requirements**
--------------

The Department of National Defence requires 18 (18) automotive oscilloscopes.

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence, Combat Training Centre
* **Contact Information**: Aaron Pound, Phone: (506) 422-7891, Email: CTCFmnContracts@forces.gc.ca

**Important Notes**
------------------

* Only pre-qualified suppliers are eligible to participate in this tender.
* Suppliers must hold a Supply arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.
* Interested suppliers can qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI at any time by downloading solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and submitting a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

I am happy to help with formating and edits. Don't hesitate to ask!  I also made mistakes on some dates,  I tried to honor the format but dates can be tricky to align with punctuation. Let
